glit:
Hello Googler and thanks for registering! 
 Stretch your fingers, get comfortable on your chairs, try to solve a rebus and get ready for a long day of Googling! 
 Submit your answers (to the PDF hosted on the Discord channel here https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/813365925058183178/813977585490329620/Felicity_2021_Googlit_questions_.pdf) here https://forms.gle/knNDrFFzEiWF8wzG8 and message Discord handles of Harish (hakr#4910) or Mukund (warnacc#1386) for doubts/ concerns. 
 Hope you survive the experience,
 The TV Room Quiz Club
